name: Joined Forces
description:
Your Lifeforce and Mana share a joint limit.

If one of them changes, the other one will adapt and and fill the rest of the limit.

This will no longer be the case if you cast [Reject Reality]:
The values become independent until you cast [Embrace Reality] and
join their combined sum into the new limit that
may differ from the previous.

Your values carry across fights.

(Press Space or Shift to fast forward animations)
